== findp.m ==
Find the p power of 10 of a number

[http://guillaumemaze.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/matlab/codes/matrix/findp.m Download here]

{{{
% FINDP Find the p power of 10 of a number
%
% p = FINDP(X) 
% Find p power of 10 of X
%
% Eg:
%	findp(4345134) = 6
%	findp(1e12) = 12
%
}}}
